thumb.title: [TAS] GB Pokémon: Yellow Version "arbitrary code execution, Bad Apple!!" by iXce in 05:24.41
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ciIkpw3glH4以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6521M TAS originally published on 2025-05-01The current Pokémon: Yellow Version speed record ( https://tasvideos.org/4329M ) uses heavy glitches that allow the player to catalog every Pokémon in slightly over a minute. Is there any way to get more ridiculous than that? Yes! In this run, using nothing but the Game Boy buttons and tool-assisted precision, the game is made to run an arbitrary program (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arbitrary_code_execution) which greatly expands the game and shows off cool stuff from elsewhere too. For details on how this was achieved, see the author's comments ( https://tasvideos.org/9565S ).This time, iXce ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/iXce ) opts to show off the popular "Bad Apple!!" music video in the game itself, with the info found below.https://alst.net/arcd0065-10th-anniversary-bad-apple-feat-nomico-phase-3/続きは転載元をご覧ください。
thumb.last_res_body: だからなぜこうなるww ﾋﾟｯﾋﾟｶ お◀つ 伝統入りの間ｗ シンボラー ヤバチャ マフォクシー カジッチュ 旧ゲームボーイだ... てゐ こんにちはッス ※前回のbadappleは... 内容はsm4472447...
